title: Lux's range needs to be half of what it is now
body:
Fuck this bitch. She has enough advantages. She has too much cc. Too much poke. Too much damage. Safest champion in the game. Nerf all of her range to half of what it is now.

Edit: I don't give a fuck about your opinions. This is fact.

Lux is an Artillery Mage.

She's supposed to have massive range.

If you cut it in half, you'd gut her into the ground.

Her abilities are pretty easy to dodge on top of this.

However, I will agree that her abilities' range should be reduced by a *small* amount.

Her Q should be changed to 1000 range from 1175.

Her W to 1000 from 1075. 

And her Ult to 3000 from 3340.

But reduce it by anymore and she'll become even more unviable than she already is.
